name: ChessBot
description: An advanced motion planning system for a 6-DOF Franka Panda robotic arm, enabling autonomous chess play using Goal-Bias RRT* and the Stockfish chess engine.

name: JARVIS
description: Turtle-shaped robot equipped with sensing tenchnology (LiDAR + Intel Realsense), chatbot capabilities (OpenAI API) and facial emotions. Jarvis also has SLAM capabilties: it can navigate, localize itself and avoid obtsacles, while recognizing faces and objects.

name: The 'John'
description: This robot features a Mecanum Drive with four wheels, enabling it to perform Simultaneous Localization and Mapping (SLAM), identify and follow targets, and shoot using a dual flywheel mechanism. It is also equipped with an automated docking system for ammunition replenishment.

name: Semantic Segmentation Model
description: Lightweight Semantic Segmentation Model built using an Enocder-Decoder architecture while integrating Multi-Scale Attention Convolutional (MSCA) blocks and Convolutional Attention modules (MCA) to refine and improve feature extraction.

name: A.I.P.D
description: A.I.P.D or A.I. Pesticide Drone is an octocopter that is capable of spraying pesticide over agricultural areas by following automatically optimized flight paths between user defined waypoints. The drone also has a 'return to base' feature for automatic pesticide refill.

name: Steel Inspection Robot
description: This steel inspection robot is designed to magnetically ascend complex steel structures while conducting simultaneous inspections, pinpointing rusty or imminent failure-prone components. Equipped with a camera, this system has been trained to identify potential structural weaknesses.

name: Financial Market Analysis
description: Development of a Python based financial market analysis tool, which leverages signal analysis and filtering techniques. A Flask-based webapp was developed to serve as the front-end for the tool.

name: Owl Tracking Robot
description: This robotic owl plush was designed to mimic the appearance of a real owl. It possesses the ability to peer and track individuals, objects, and animals of interest, making it ideal for discreet wildlife monitoring purposes.

name: Monocular Depth Estimation Model
description: Lightweight Depth Estimation Model built using an Enocder-Decoder architecture while integrating Multi-Scale Attention Convolutional (MSCA) blocks and Dual Attention Transformer (DAT) Modules to enhance global and local feature analysis.

name: Portfolio Wesbite
description: A portfolio website designed using HTML, CSS and JavaScript to showcase projects.
